code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function LoginPage(){const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[error,setError]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{if(localStorage.getItem("vc_logged_in")==="true"){navigate("/dashboard");}},[navigate]);function handleLogin(e){e.preventDefault();if(email.trim()&&password.trim()){localStorage.setItem("vc_logged_in","true");navigate("/dashboard");}else{setError("Please enter email and password");}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen flex flex-col justify-center items-center bg-gray-50",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"bg-white p-8 rounded shadow max-w-sm w-full space-y-4",onSubmit:handleLogin,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex justify-center mb-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/amazon-icon.png",alt:"Amazon Logo",className:"h-12 w-auto"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-center mb-6",children:"Vendor Central Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"border p-2 rounded w-full",type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"border p-2 rounded w-full",type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-red-500 text-sm text-center",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"w-full bg-[#232f3e] text-white py-2 rounded font-semibold",children:"Log In"})]})});}
